snippet: Republican legislators are pushing to make Oklahoma the first state to allow the use of nitrogen gas in executions.
abstract: Republican legislators in Oklahoma propose using nitrogen gas in executions as backup method for rendering inmates unconscious; move comes as state's lethal injection formula is under review by United States Supreme Court due to botched procedures.
lead_paragraph: Republican legislators are pushing to make Oklahoma the first state to allow the use of nitrogen gas in executions.

headline.main: Oklahoma Debates Use of Nitrogen Gas for Executions
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Debates Use of Nitrogen Gas for Executions
